name: geomancy
effect: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.x_y: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
